ValidationRule.description: Requires the Referring Employee field to be required when the lead source begins with Referral - Internal. This rule will only be valid for records created or modified after 10/29/2012.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Referring_Employee__c = NULL, BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource), "Referral-Internal"), TODAY() >= DATE(2012,10,29), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')), OR(ISNEW(), AND(ISCHANGED(LeadSource), BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource), "Referral-Internal"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: *** Referring Employee is required for Internal Referrals ***
